ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Why did you start a Bard? [How many days have you p layed!?]
ygData.msgSnippet: Ack! I tell ya, women come up with the most wicked things to do at times. Wish I were always so creative. ;-)
ygData.messageBody:
Ack!

I tell ya, women come up with the most wicked things to do at times. Wish I
were always so creative. ;-)
